reviews.review_text:
Look, the food is great - won't deny that.
But the thing that made the rating so low was the wait. We had to wait around 40 minutes for our food to arrive.
And this was at a time when the place is hardly even with any customers.
The quantity of the food could've been better. The taste is great. The wait time is absolutely horrible.

Some of the best food I've had in India. Went back here everyday for more. The pin on Google maps is correct it's not on the beach despite some of the Google photos. A lovely little spot in Anjuna for some great quality, fair priced food!

Pathetic food on a rather empty day at the shack. We were only table that was occupied at 12pm at this deserted shack. Called for a chicken penne pasta in pink sauce. While the presentation was classy, the chicken pieces were awful. There were tough cartilage pieces which we kept spitting out every other bite. When we raised this with the waiter who was blank right from the start, he called a chef out who came and dug in between the pieces and said there were just 2 to 3 such bad pieces which was by accident. Can't beat this feedback from the cook! When we asked them to look into it, they spent 15 minutes and did nothing about it and the dish was still sitting in their kitchen. We called for the bill and paid for it anyways. While exiting we decided to just have a word with the owner/ person incharge at the counter, he said he was aware of the dish being returned and countered our feedback with "we only buy boneless chicken". I told him I don't want anything in return but wanted to share feedback as a customer,  he gave a sly smile in return. That pretty much sums things up from - Delayed service, rude staff and unpleasant food. Best to not fall for the reasonable pricing and visit a better place..
